name: Pumpernickel Spinach Dip I
author: The Iron Chef -- Suzi-Q
summary: A lovely pumpernickel bread bowl is the container for this simple spinach dip. It's perfect for parties, tastes fabulous and is attractive to look at. Dry onion soup mix may be substituted for dry dill dip mix.
ingredients: ½ (8 ounce) package cream cheese, softened
1 (1 ounce) package dry dill dip mix
½ bunch spinach, rinsed and chopped
directions: In a medium bowl, stir together the sour cream, cream cheese, mayonnaise, dill dip mix and spinach
Cut out the center of the pumpernickel loaf, creating a bowl
Cut the removed bread into bite-sized pieces
Fill the hollowed loaf with the sour cream mixture
